1:
Yahweh, hear me while I pray to you!\q2 Because you are righteous
\q2 and because you faithfully do what you have promised,
\q2 listen to what I am pleading for you to do for me.
\q1
2:
I am one who worships you;\q1 do not judge me
\q2 because you do not consider anyone to be completely innocent.



\q1
3:
My enemies have pursued me;\q2 they have completely defeated me.
\q1 It is as though they have put me in a dark prison
\q1 where I have nothing good to hope for.
\q1
4:
So I am very discouraged in my inner being;\q2 I am very dismayed.



\q1
6:
I lift up my hands to you while I pray;\q2 I want very much to be with you as much as I would thirst for water in a vast wilderness.



\q1
7:
Yahweh, I am very discouraged,\q2 so please answer me right now!
\q1 Do not keep away from me
\q2 because if you do that, I will soon be among those who descend to where the dead people are.
\q1
8:
Every morning cause me to remember that you faithfully love me\q2 because I trust in you.
\q1 I pray to you;
\q2 show me the things that I should do.


\q1
9:
Yahweh, I have gone to you for you to protect me,\q2 so rescue me from my enemies.
\q1
10:
You are my God;\q2 teach me to do what you want me to do.
\q1 I want your good Spirit to show me the right things to do.



\q1
11:
Yahweh, restore me when I am close to dying as you promised to do\q2 because you are righteous!
\q1
12:
I am one who serves you;\q1 so because you faithfully love me as you promised to do,
\q2 kill my enemies
\q2 and get rid of all those who oppress me.
